name: 3D Paperball
description:
Simple and relaxing! Toss the paper ball into the trash can, in a beautifully modeled 3d environment.

Unique! Use bounces against walls, furniture or any object to redirect the ball into the bin. The more the bounces, the higher the score!

Truly free (not a demo, no paid features!)
Addictive!
Realistic 3d physics and environment
Statistics graph showing your progress
